sentences.english: A person who meddles or pries into the affairs of others.
sentences.chinese: 另外有個矮小的，好管閒事的人拉他的胳膊。

sentences.english: Huang is a small man with a firm handshake and an easy demeanor.
sentences.chinese: 身材矮小的黃偉握手有力，態度隨和。

sentences.english: A little body often harbours a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 偉大的靈魂常寓於矮小的身軀。

sentences.english: The main reason which wild jujube was short under drought was because growing was stopped earlier.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱導致的過早停止生長是酸棗植株矮小的主要原因。

sentences.english: The little dressmaker bought an envelope of nasturtium seeds at the florists.
sentences.chinese: 那個個子矮小的女裁縫在花鋪裏買了一包金蓮花種子。

sentences.english: And participants who had had short avatars accepted less - than -even money more often than the tall ones.
sentences.chinese: 而使用矮小角色的人則接受不平均的金錢。
要提防身材矮小的攝影師。

sentences.english: Used brush stroke on her face again drawing, would be a short small mini man.
sentences.chinese: 再在她臉上用筆畫了畫，便是一個矮小的小男人。

sentences.english: The low and small houses on both sides of the road have been demolished due to its widening.
sentences.chinese: 由於街道的擴建，道路兩旁矮小的房屋全部被拆除了。

sentences.english: Short stature and gonadal dysgenesis are two major characteristic clinical features of this syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 身材矮小和性腺發育不全是其主要臨牀特徵。

sentences.english: Crops for fuel, in contrast, can be ugly or stunted.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下燃料作物可以其貌不揚或發育矮小。

sentences.english: The main clinical features are short stature and a typical coxa vara deformity.
sentences.chinese: 主要臨牀表現爲身材矮小和典型的髖內翻畸形。

sentences.english: The shortest are about 65 feet, or 20 metres, high.
sentences.chinese: 最矮小的鑽機則只有65尺或20米高。

sentences.english: He is like Gulliver at Liliput overwhelmed by an enormous number of a little men.
sentences.chinese: 他會象格列弗在裏裏普特那樣，被無數矮小的人治服。

sentences.english: At that moment, from behindtheshort bush, there appear the artillery ensign.
sentences.chinese: 此時從矮小的叢林後面出現了炮兵部隊的軍旗。

sentences.english: A little body doth often harbour a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 偉除夜的心靈常寓於矮小的身軀當中。
